body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install gcc@8.3.0
...
  >> 2426    checking for off_t... checking size of long long... configure: err
             or: in `spack-stage-gcc-8.3.0-6ypg
             gmswzvrzgw3lq6tovkv23mect6ee/spack-src/spack-build/gcc':
  >> 2427    configure: error: cannot compute sizeof (long long)
```

### Information on your system

$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.15.0
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-broadwell

### Additional information

Related to #3943 and #1866 which were not properly fixed but *avoided*.

PR #9024 solves this issue. (and I think +binutils should become the default).

Maintainer is @michaelkuhn .

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: gcc@8.,3.0 with centos7 default compiler
